amendment.description: Amendment reduces the appropriation for fossil energy research and development by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 31 in the Congressional Record of July 11, 1995, to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill for fossil energy research and development by $5 million. The intent of the amendment would be to eliminate funding for an oil research project at the National Institute for Petroleum Energy Research in Bartlesville, Oklahoma.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kleczka amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 160 (Roll no. 514).
